name: People Are Just A Resource
description: People are just a resource” is an economic strategy. You are the King governing the Gviden Kingdom which things are not going well. Amounts of people and money in treasury are getting low. However, you can correct these things. While building different types of buildings you are able to increase your finance income but be aware of any decision may cost life of your inhabitants. Build mines to increase money income, but while working on mines amount of people decreases. To heal people and increase birthrate you may build hospitals, but it also reduces money income. To make a good mood of your inhabitants you can build taverns. By farms you can increase birthrate. Buildings are also costs money, people and mood, so be sure that you have enough resources to build them! Your goal is to reach maximum in one of three parameters: amount of people, mood or money. If you have dropped one of them to 0, you got lose.
